features: 【Soft Sponge Head】The sponge head is made of PU material, which is wear resistant and highly absorbent, enabling it to effectively remove stains without wearing the surfaces. The package comes with two sponge heads, making it easy to assemble and disassemble, and allowing for long-term use.
【Storable Design】Hanging design, easy to solve the trouble of cotton head stains, easy to store, does not take up space, very wear-resistant, suitable for long-term repeated use.

【Compact and Lightweight Design】Our portable self-squeezing mini mop has a stretch length of 11.6*6.1in, 230G, featuring light weight and small size, allowing you to clean it easily and store it easily. The small mop head storage size is perfect for tight spaces and on-the-go, such as small apartments, dorm rooms, and RVs.

【Portable Mini Mop】Portable Mini Mop features a ring-type push-pull design that allows for easy wringing of the mop head by pulling up the hand ring. Cleaning and dehydration integrated, making it practical and labor-saving.

【Wet and Dry Dual-use & Hand-free Washing】: Water stains can be wiped off immediately, No water stains, ring-type push-pull design, folded in half for 180-degree strong extrusion, washing and dehydration integrated, single-handed pulling and squeezing water, Suitable for all kinds of table tops, window glass, floors, kitchens, living rooms and bathrooms.
body.description: Introducing our Portable Self-Squeeze Short Mop, a game-changer in the world of efficient and convenient cleaning. This mini lazy hand wash-free mop is designed with your busy lifestyle in mind, providing a quick and effective solution for keeping your spaces pristine. Compact and Lightweight Design: Measuring at a stretch length of 11.6*6.1 inches and weighing only 230 grams, our portable mini mop boasts a compact and lightweight design. Its small size and minimal weight make it incredibly easy to handle and store, making it an ideal choice for tight spaces, small apartments, dorm rooms, and even on-the-go cleaning in RVs. Portable Mini Mop: Featuring a unique ring-type push-pull design, our Portable Mini Mop simplifies the wringing process with a convenient hand ring. This design not only ensures easy operation but also integrates cleaning and dehydration, making it a practical and labor-saving solution for your everyday cleaning needs. Wet and Dry Dual-use & Hand-free Washing: Experience the versatility of our mop with its wet and dry dual-use capability. Tackle water stains immediately with the ring-type push-pull design, allowing for 180-degree strong extrusion when folded in half. This integrated washing and dehydration feature enables single-handed pulling and squeezing, making it suitable for various surfaces such as table tops, window glass, floors, kitchens, living rooms, and bathrooms. Soft Sponge Head: The sponge head, crafted from durable PU material, is not only wear-resistant but also highly absorbent. This ensures effective stain removal without causing damage to surfaces. With two sponge heads included in the package, assembly and disassembly are a breeze, allowing for long-term use and convenience. Upgrade your cleaning routine with the Portable Self-Squeeze Short Mop – where efficiency meets portability for a spotless living environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this Mini Mop, and it's been a game-changer for my quick cleaning routine. First of all easy to install and use ! The wet soft sponge head is safe for surfaces like my kitchen granite counters, glass, and even my car !! The self-squeeze feature is a real time-saver.Highly recommend for anyone looking for efficient and convenient cleaning!
